questions.question: The highest Test team total is over 950 runs.
England holds the record for highest ODI team total with 498/4.
The lowest Test team total is 26 all out by New Zealand.
Afghanistan holds the record for highest T20I team total.
Australia has the longest winning streak in ODI cricket.
The West Indies have never been bowled out for under 50 in Test cricket.
South Africa holds the record for the largest victory margin by runs in ODI cricket.
The shortest completed Test match lasted less than 2 days.
India has scored 400+ runs in a Test innings more than any other team.
No team has ever been bowled out twice in a single day of Test cricket.
